## List of quantitative courses at Cornell

Steve Ellner's modeling course is a nice overview of dynamic models in ecological systems with a heavy R component: https://classes.cornell.edu/browse/roster/SP22/class/BIOEE/7600

NTRES3100	Applied Population Ecology	Evan Cooch
CRP 7201	Research Design	Mildred Warner

BTRY 6020	Statistical Methods II	Joe Guiness
NTRES 6200	Spatial Modeling and Analysis	David Rossiter
PLSCS 4290	Remote Sensing and Modeling	Ying Sun
PAM 4101	Causal Reasoning & Policy Evaluation 1	Max Kapustin
BEE 6310	Multivariate Statistics for Environmental Applications	Scott Steinschneider
DEA 6560	Research Methods in Social Sciences	Nancy Wells
CS 1380	Data Science for All	David Williamson
